text: You people are taking a test that will determine the course

Search and rescue found those lost climbers.

for chief of surgery and chief resident.

Is that an ax in his head ?

whether you're the one who cut them open or not.

Start 2 large bore I.V.S and bolus 2 liters L.R.

and tell them your team did everything they could to save someone's child...
get me a stat E.K.G. And a portable chest, Brooke.
you guys, why don't you go have a seat

I thought I was gonna hate this party game thing, but it's kinda great.

Okay, these wedding vows are not all gonna fit on here.
You don't need vows on your hand.
When you get up there, just speak from the heart.

It pumps, it circulates blood, it gets clogged from time to time.
It doesn't have tiny little lips on it.
I'm gonna like being married. It's the wedding part that's ridiculous.
Hey, mine didn't go off. Piece of crap.
Become a piece of chattel ? Sure. Looking forward to it.

I get it. My wedding's about you.
Vitals are stabilizing after fluids, but...
- I thought he was dead. - He was according to his friends.

We haven't done a C.T. yet.

There's been a little head trauma.
What the hell happened up on that mountain ?
You don't think it could be uterine cancer, do you ?
she was in earlier. She was in a fender bender.
My wife came into my hospital, and you neglected to tell me ?
She's unconscious. There are medical decisions to be made.
- Legally I have a right to know. I have a right... - She might...
I need to know what time your chest pain started.
What time exactly ? This is important.
I'm gonna explain everything to you. I promise.
But right now we need to get you up to the surgical floor.

You don't need to decide anything right now.
Right now the most important thing is making sure that you are okay.
Ah, I've got a surgery, but it shouldn't be more than four hours, five tops.
I need to get a C.T. angio, but I'm pretty sure it's a tear in her aorta.
Her heart is about to blow.
Most dissecting aortas burst within 48 hours.
Which means we have less than 12 hours to fix it before she's dead.
- So you need me to get the babies out. - So I can save her life.
Hey, I promise I will make it to the chapel in time.
Okay. Listen up. Uh, O'Malley, you're with Shepherd and Sloan.
Stevens, you're with Burke. Karev, Addison. Go.
Grey... you are with the chief's wife.
Yes, I did say pregnant. I recommend that you lose the shocked look and try
for something a little more dignified. Go.
Uh, I didn't page you. Go home. Get some sleep.
Yeah, but I'm here already, so...
You're getting married in less than 12 hours.
Well, uh, Burke's getting married, too, and he gets to operate.
I've given you the day off, the whole day.
It's a kindness. Take it. It's your wedding day.
- There'll always be more surgeries. - But...
really, what would you rather be doing,
preparing a patient or preparing for your wedding ? Go home.
Saison 3 Episode 25 "Didn't we almost have it all ?"
I never got the sense you really wanted the job.
Seems to me you got in the race to play out some kind of unfinished
I was in this to win, sir.
I don't know if he's your new chief,
but if he is, he got there because I made him fight for it.
You made them all fight for it.
So I'm not gonna be chief.
So why don't you tell me what really happened up there on the mountain ?
W-we're half way up this ice wall. There's a...
a couple of huned feet above us. We figured we'd set up the tents,
Only Lonnie's insisting we go down the mountain.
I told him, we gotta dig in, sit tight.
He started freaking out, keeps saying down's the way to go.
And then he starts climbing down.
- And just like that... - We're falling.
I swing out with my ice ax,
just trying to catch a rock.
And I clip Lonnie in the back of the head.
You've been unconscious for a while.
Adele, you lost a lot of blood.
I'm gonna try to find a heartbeat.
It's a little slower, than I'd like,
but once we tank you with liquids and a transfusion,
I've gotta rush off to surgery, but I will back with you the minute I'm done

What do you think you would've done,
I'm sure you have work to do.
The peds resident's on call. He'll be in the O.R. for Rina's delivery.

Sorry for interrupting. The nurse said that you're Dr. M-Montgomery.
Yes. Can I help you with something ?
I should've never let you go.
I'll never let you go again.
- I heard you're the best man. - Yeah.
- Maid of honor, best man, kinda perfect. - Yeah.
I know I haven't been myself lately, but
I'm me again, so I was thinking maybe you should sleep over, because
the me that I am is horny for the you that you are.
I met a woman last night.
- You met a woman last night ? - At Joe's.
She was pretty, I noticed, and we talked.
- You met a woman last night ? - Yeah.
- So should I be worried or something ?
Should you be worried that I met a woman ?
for me, flirting with that woman was the highlight of my week ?
Yeah, you should be worried or something.
No, I understand that part. What I don't understand is why.
Richard. I need it more than the others.
- Addison... - No, I need a reason
I need a reason to get up in the morning. I need to wake up
and not care that it's raining or that I'm 39 and alone.
If you need a job to give you a life,
you either need a new job
I'm thinking four hours tops to repair this heart,
And how's the best man ? Up to the challenge ?
I was an excellent best man.
You know, the worst case scenario is I sleep with your wife in ten years.
I just checked. Chief resident hasn't been posted yet.
- for chief resident. - Yeah, you were.
- Hey. - What I'm about to say is, is crazy.
I-I am saying this against my will. Because I am a surgeon,
okay ? I-I-I love my job. I love my life exactly as it is.
Okay ? Exactly as it is. Do you understand what I'm saying ?
I-I have no desire to house a human being in my body for 9 long months
and then...and then...and then push it out and raise it. Okay ? None.
for nine long months is all that I can think about.
It... it... the thoughts are invading the surgeries that I love, and it's... it's...
it's... it's hormonal. It's... and horrible.
You want to have a baby ?
There's a guy with an ax in his head.
I'm a freak. Just go. Just run. Just...
Take your pill... and drink your water.
Richard, you know you wanna go out that door and start bossing some

I can do my bossing right from this chair.

what do you want to do about the announcement for chief of surgery ?
Look, I will be right back.
My husband always flirted with your mother.
I didn't want to see that, so...
You get married at 25 thinking, this is it, happily ever after.
Maybe there is no happily ever after.
Is it supposed to be so tight ?
I just don't know if it's me.
Five generations of Burke women have worn this on their wedding day.
I'm afraid I missjudged you early on. I thought you were selfish.
But you've given way to Preston's ideas about the wedding,
and you've been flexible about the things that are...
what were you planning to do about your eyebrows ?
How'd the reunion go with Jane Doe's husband ?
Whatever. He cried like a baby. She looked bored.
Don't go overboard with compassion, Karev.
She's not even sure if she wants to stay with the guy.
- They're married. - She took a vow.
You don't mess with vows. Married is married.
She's bleeding out. Addison, how much longer ?

Got the first one out. Clamp.
- Second baby's out. Okay, go. - Boki, 10-blade.

Well, he shouldn't have tried turning back.
The group is going up, you move with the group.
You have a right to turn back if you're scared.
You chose to climb a mountain.
You can't change your mind in the middle of the climb.
- Okay. - Now we pull it out ?
Ah, yeah, but the ax went in as they fell, so there will be some tearing,
it should be a shallow wound,
- and it should come out easily. - You got it ?
All right, everybody. Here we go. Ready?
- That's a clean cut. - I thought you said there was gonna be tearing.
I know. It doesn't make sense.
Or the ax didn't go in there by accident.
but I hold you to a higher standard.
And you let me down this year, Preston.
this job is about making the tough calls.
Sometimes the toughest call you can make
is admitting when you're in over your head.
You're one of the best surgeons I know...
I want to give you the job.
I have a wedding to get to.
Yeah. The babies are doing great.
How are you doing up there, Preston ?

We may actually get you to the church on time. You nervous ?
Except by my vows. I wrote them myself,

to be there in sickness and in health.
And I do not stand here
I hold them in my hands.

to lay my heart in the palm of your hands.

'cause if it's really what you want, we could do it.

how could you not look for her ?
We got into a fight that night.
She was trying to tell me how unhappy she was and...
Yeah, I didn't look for her when she was missing, but what's worse is...
I didn't see her when she was there.
I can't imagine what it must have been like for her,
what her face must have looked like all broken.
You know, no big deal. Just thought I should know.

but the damage he sustained is significant.

I have to talk to his family. You guys can talk to the cops.

and they called her a Burke.

you have to let me cut,

you don't have to do this today.

for a second, I thought I'd lost you.

Well, the father of the baby, maybe you want to...

I thought he'd go running for the hills.
He's a much better man than I thought.
He'll get over his initial judgments, and he'll...
and he'll make you drink your water.

He has a wedding to get to.
Come on. You want your bride waiting for you at the altar ?
They don't like that. Let's go.
You can still do this, right ?
I just wanted to make sure no one's around so I can say this.

- Look, I can do this myself. - Let me speak.
Because I'm your best friend and because I love you,
if what you want is to be with Callie,
then I will do everything in my power to support you
and help you make your marriage work.
But because I'm your best friend
that I'm in love with you.
I can't promise the future, I can't promise perfection because
we're us and I'm me and who knows what will happen.
I'm in love with you, George.
And I hope you're in love with me, too.

Dr. Burke asked me to check on you.
Let's see. Your, post-op x-rays look good. We'll discuss releasing you.

I put him out of his misery.

I have every reason to go,
there's no need for me to stay.

What do you want from me?
I want you to give me a reason to stay...

you know me. You knew... you knew when I couldn't even speak who I was.

I think you should stay with the decent guy.

meredith, I don't want to see you anymore.

I do love you. Don't you see ?
You're the love of my life. I can't leave you.

not your friends, but you leave me.

please... please just end it, because I can't. I'm in it.

you were too emotionally stunted to settle down.

we do not get unlimited chances

than missing an opportunity that could've changed your life.

did I... did I fail you, george ?

you will walk down the aisle. You will get married.

not the woman that I'm trying to make you be, not

his grandmother's picture was by the bed.

help me, help me, help me !
